div.pre: 1210 Vourla (now Urla; anc. Clazomenae), Ionia, 1964 Burial: c. 360 B.C. Contents: 47+ AR Athens: 5+ tetradr. Clazomenae: 42 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Hurter, SNR 1966, pp. 26-35, illus. The appearance of Athenian coins is not mentioned by Hurter, but rests on reliable information
